user.title: Set up Circadian Light Services
user.description: This integration provides services to control Circadian Light. Make sure the Circadian Light addon is installed and running before proceeding.

step_up.name: Step Up
step_up.description: Increase brightness and shift color along the circadian curve

step_down.name: Step Down
step_down.description: Decrease brightness and shift color along the circadian curve

color_up.name: Color Up
color_up.description: Shift color along the curve (brightness unchanged)

color_down.name: Color Down
color_down.description: Shift color along the curve (brightness unchanged)

reset.name: Reset
reset.description: Reset area to current time values and enable Circadian Light

circadian_on.name: Circadian On
circadian_on.description: Turn on lights and enable Circadian Light mode for an area

area_id.name: Area
area_id.description: The area(s) to enable Circadian Light for

circadian_off.name: Circadian Off
circadian_off.description: Disable Circadian Light mode for an area (lights remain unchanged)

area_id.name: Area
area_id.description: The area(s) to disable Circadian Light for

circadian_toggle.name: Circadian Toggle
circadian_toggle.description: Smart toggle - turns on with Circadian Light if off, turns off if on

freeze.name: Freeze
freeze.description: Pause automatic updates for an area

unfreeze.name: Unfreeze
unfreeze.description: Resume automatic updates for an area
